::FireBlade::
FireBlade walked on toward the base...but then stopped while still a
whiles away. He looked down to his unarmored chest. He thought a bit
then took his sword and cutting a couple layers of his armour on his
arms stuck the layers over his chest. He held the sword with the tip
pointing at him and suddenly a burst of flame shot fourth from the tip
of the blade.  The stips of armour had been wielded onto his chest
covering his spark. Satisfied with his do it yourself repairs he
walked on....
